name: Quietus Allurment
storyline: Quietus Allurement follows a captured man trapped in a facility that is doing illegal tests on him. Things go awry when the head of the facility began creating creatures and releasing them on the scientists and test subjects. The attacks grew in number until the facility was overrun. Now the captured man must fight his way out to gain his freedom before the creatures kill him as well.
